channel.title: Rust on Skyscraper
channel.description: Recent content in Rust on Skyscraper

item.title: Rust Cargo Module
item.description: 本地不同项目之间模块调用示例 目录结构如下 . ├── bar │ ├── Cargo.lock │ ├── Cargo.toml │ └── src │ ├── hello │ │ ├── greet.rs │ │ └── mod.rs │ └── lib.rs └── foo ├── Cargo.lock ├── Cargo.toml └── src └── main.rs bar 工程 ( Library Project ) greet.rs pub fn greeting() { println!("hello world"); } mod.rs pub mod greet; lib.rs pub mod hello; foo 工程 ( Binary Project ) Cargo.
